name: Akapolis
description:
Akapolis is a 2D Pixelart Metroidvania!

In Akapolis, you play as a Tiny Robot and you have to fight against the Villain Mr Unfair. Mr. Unfair is a Robot and he has a Army of evil robots. He wants to conquer the City of Akapolis and you have to prevent his plan.

why Akapolis?

The name of the Game is Akapolis, because the name of the city in the game is Akapolis. Polis is the Greek name for "City" and the name of the Color Palette I use for this Game is "Aka"

Features:

  • Play in 3 different Districts of Akapolis
  • Controller Support
